WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

if you hit the command "Clean SoftwareDistribution Folder" and the folder is __already empty__ WPP shows within the status window "__failed__".

The command was not failed in this case - the folder was already empty. It will be much better if WPP shows "__folder already empty__" instead of "failed". If I see "failed" somewhere, I think that something goes wrong - but it does. __Confusing status output__.

Greetings
Purecut

Comments.Message: WPP now display "Succeeded" even if the folder have been already deleted.
